First Post

14 Sep 2014

Most of us probably keep lists of project and startup ideas (some clever, many terrible). I had a thought that it might be cool to collect mine in public rather than locked away in Evernote, maybe sparking a conversations about these back-of-the-napkin ideas. Find me on Twitter at @ztaylor.
